column4: Can anyone help me get the progress-bar for boot to show up? My screen has no output between grub and GDM
that might have something to do with /boot/grub/menu.list
i added vga=795 (795 is for my color depth and resolution) and it does not work
ive had problems with that, too. just remove the vga setting
the vga setting wasnt there. i added it, according to a thread on the forums
i understand what you say, but vga has not worked for me either in gutsy
have you managed to get it to work?
heres a link to the thread i used http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=584205&page=3
every time i try to specify a vga setting, my tty's are all garbled and theres no feedback until gdm steps in
i couldnt figure it out, no. but im sure thats causing your problem
yeah. im sort of determined to get this to work. i wish it was more straightforward
i tried posting on the forums once, but nobody gave me any answers...
hmm...i found another post about editing yet another thing in the menu.lst so ill try that out
can you give me the address please?
earlier with gutsy i was hoping its a kernel problem, but updates didnt solve it
i posted the link to the forum thread, but here it is again: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=584205&page=3
does anyone know why oggenc converts some flacs but cant recognize other flacs?
